sentence.Network_en: She looked appreciatively at Blair's lovely pictures.
sentence.Network_cn: 她欣赏着布莱尔可爱的照片。

sentence.Network_en: Across the table, his son Benjie munched appreciatively.
sentence.Network_cn: 桌子对面，他儿子本吉有滋有味地吃着。

sentence.Network_en: Mr. Bob lit his cigar, savoured it appreciatively.
sentence.Network_cn: 鲍勃先生点着雪茄烟, 欣赏地品评烟味.

list.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... precious a 珍贵的 appreciate v 评价；欣赏 appreciative a 有欣赏力的.
九年级英语单词表 ... suppor 支持；帮组 appreciate 感激 donation 捐赠物；捐赠.
金融词汇 - 豆丁网 ... Appeals panel 上诉委员会 Appreciation [财产] 增值；涨价 Appropriation 拨款；经费；指拨金额.
商务英语词汇大全_外语教育网 ... yield 产量收益,收益率 increase in value,appreciation 增值,升值 duty 税.

entry.def: An appreciative reaction or comment shows the enjoyment that you are getting from something.

example.ex: There is a murmur of appreciative laughter...
example.tran: 发出一阵赞赏的低笑声。

example.ex: Mrs Hastings' eyes grow warmer and more appreciative with my every word.
example.tran: 我讲的每句话让黑斯廷斯夫人的眼神变得越来越热情，越来越充满欣赏。

entry.def: If you are appreciative of something, you are grateful for it.

example.ex: We have been very appreciative of their support...
example.tran: 我们对他们的支持一直心存感激。

example.ex: Tom is genuinely appreciative of all the success he's had.
example.tran: 汤姆为他自己获得的所有成功由衷地感激。

means.word_mean: 1. with appreciation; in a grateful manner;

auth_sentence.content: The old man looks...appreciatively at the nurses; even manages a...leer.
auth_sentence.res_content: The old man looks...appreciatively at the nurses; even manages a...leer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The old man looks...appreciatively at the nurses; even manages a...leer.

auth_sentence.content: But once you have oohed and aahed appreciatively, you return home to your own kitchen of skillets and forks.
auth_sentence.res_content: But once you have oohed and aahed appreciatively, you return home to your own kitchen of skillets and forks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But once you have oohed and aahed appreciatively, you return home to your own kitchen of skillets and forks.

auth_sentence.content: Wherever Roy Hodgson has gone in Poland and Ukraine, David Bernstein has been close behind, beaming appreciatively.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Wherever Roy Hodgson has gone in Poland and Ukraine, David Bernstein has been close behind, beaming appreciatively.
